name: Bell-Whitley Community Action Agency, Inc.
description: Bell-Whitley Community Action Agency is a non-profit organization that provides comprehensive services to help individuals and families achieve self-sufficiency. Services include LIHEAP energy assistance, housing programs, food assistance, employment services, Head Start early childhood education, and various community support programs. The agency serves Bell and Whitley Counties in Kentucky.
source: Verified from official Bell-Whitley CAA website, contact information, and multiple business directories
notes: This is the Whitley County office location. The agency also has a Bell County office at 129 North Pine Street, Pineville, KY 40977 with phone (606) 337-3044. Toll-free number: (866) 587-6773. Services include LIHEAP, housing assistance, food programs, employment services, and Head Start.
